casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. GUILFOYLE
v.
INDUS. COMM. 2018-1099 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 21, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

Sua sponte, appellant Industrial Commission ordered to show cause within seven days why its appeal should not be dismissed as moot in light of the settlement referred to in the application for dismissal filed in this case on February 28, 2019, by appellant Big Lots, Inc. Appellee, Dolores J. Guilfoyle, may file a response within seven days of the filing of the Industrial Commission's response.
